General.Name: Pamel Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. engages in the operation of power plants in Turkey. It operates 2 hydroelectric power plants with an installed power of 6,946 MW located in Adiyaman province and 7.49 MW located in Tortum district of Erzurum province. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Maslak Mah. Eski BUeyUekdere Cad. Iz Plz, Istanbul, Turkey
